languages.text: {n}Мужчина чихает — и на его лице растекается новое пятно грязи, вытекшей из носа. Офицер умоляюще смотрит на вас:{/n} "Что это за кошмарное видение? Я вел гвардейцев Императора к гнезду болотных дьяволов по топям родного мира... но вместо этого я указывал путь... этим?..." {n}Трясущейся рукой он указывает на трупы ксеносов.{/n} "Наваждение... еретический морок..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина чихает — и на его лице растекается новое пятно грязи, вытекшей из носа. Офицер умоляюще смотрит на вас:{/n} "Что это за кошмарное видение? Я вел гвардейцев Императора к гнезду болотных дьяволов по топям родного мира... но вместо этого я указывал путь... этим?..." {n}Трясущейся рукой он указывает на трупы ксеносов.{/n} "Наваждение... еретический морок..."

languages.text: {n}The man sneezes, and the lower half of his face is coated anew in the slime streaming from his nose. The officer casts you a pleading look.{/n} "What is this nightmarish scene? I was leading the Emperor's Guards to the swamp devils' nest across the marshlands of my homeworld... but instead of that I was showing the way to... them?" {n}He points at the corpses of the xenos with a trembling hand.{/n} "Hallucinations... A heretical mirage..."

Я вел гвардейцев Императора к гнезду болотных дьяволов по топям родного мира... но вместо этого я указывал путь... этим?..." {n}Трясущейся рукой он указывает на трупы ксеносов.{/n} "Наваждение... еретический морок..."

languages.text: {n}男がくしゃみをすると、顔の下半分が鼻から流れてくる粘着物で新たに覆われた。士官は懇願するようにこちらを見つめてきた。{/n}「この悪夢のような光景はなんですか？私は皇帝の護衛を率いて故郷の湿地帯にある沼地の悪魔の巣に向かっていたのに…私が…奴らを案内していたと？」{n}彼は異種族の死体を震える手で指差した。{/n}「幻覚だ…これは異端の幻影だ…」
languages.original_text: {n}The man sneezes, and the lower half of his face is coated anew in the slime streaming from his nose. The officer casts you a pleading look.{/n} "What is this nightmarish scene? I was leading the Emperor's Guards to the swamp devils' nest across the marshlands of my homeworld... but instead of that I was showing the way to... them?" {n}He points at the corpses of the xenos with a trembling hand.{/n} "Hallucinations... A heretical mirage..."

traits.locale_text: {n}男がくしゃみをすると、顔の下半分が鼻から流れてくる粘着物で新たに覆われた。士官は懇願するようにこちらを見つめてきた。{/n}「この悪夢のような光景はなんですか？私は皇帝の護衛を率いて故郷の湿地帯にある沼地の悪魔の巣に向かっていたのに…私が彼らを悪魔の根城に案内していたと？」{n}彼は異種族の死体を震える手で指差した。{/n}「幻覚だ…これは異端の幻影だ…」

languages.text: {n}这个军官打了个喷嚏，下半张脸再次被鼻子里流出来的粘液覆盖。他朝你投来了恳切的目光。{/n}“这究竟是什么噩梦啊？我刚刚正在给帝皇的卫队指路，穿过我的故乡的沼泽，前往沼泽魔鬼的巢穴……但我其实……是在……给他们带路？”{n}他颤抖着，指着异形的尸体。{/n}“都是幻觉……是异端的海市蜃楼……”
languages.original_text: {n}The man sneezes, and the lower half of his face is coated anew in the slime streaming from his nose. The officer casts you a pleading look.{/n} "What is this nightmarish scene? I was leading the Emperor's Guards to the swamp devils' nest across the marshlands of my homeworld... but instead of that I was showing the way to... them?" {n}He points at the corpses of the xenos with a trembling hand.{/n} "Hallucinations... A heretical mirage..."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个军官打了个喷嚏，下半张脸再次被鼻子里流出来的粘液覆盖。他朝你投来了恳切的目光。{/n}“这究竟是什么噩梦啊？我刚刚正在给帝皇的卫队指路，穿过我的故乡的沼泽，前往沼泽魔鬼的巢穴……但我其实……是在……给他们带路？”{n}他颤抖着，指着异形的尸体。{/n}“都是幻觉……是异端的海市蜃楼……”

languages.text: {n}El hombre estornuda y la mitad inferior de su cara vuelve a cubrirse de la sustancia viscosa que brota de su nariz. El oficial te lanza una mirada de súplica.{/n} «¿Qué pesadilla es esta? Estaba guiando a la Guardia Imperial al nido de los diablos del pantano al otro lado de la ciénaga en mi planeta natal, pero resulta que... les estaba guiando... ¿a ellos?». {n}Señala a los xenos muertos con mano temblorosa.{/n} «Alucinaciones... un espejismo hereje...».
languages.original_text: {n}The man sneezes, and the lower half of his face is coated anew in the slime streaming from his nose. The officer casts you a pleading look.{/n} "What is this nightmarish scene? I was leading the Emperor's Guards to the swamp devils' nest across the marshlands of my homeworld... but instead of that I was showing the way to... them?" {n}He points at the corpses of the xenos with a trembling hand.{/n} "Hallucinations... A heretical mirage..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre estornuda y la mitad inferior de su cara vuelve a cubrirse de la sustancia viscosa que brota de su nariz. El oficial te lanza una mirada de súplica.{/n} «¿Qué pesadilla es esta? Estaba guiando a la Guardia Imperial al nido de los diablos del pantano al otro lado de la ciénaga en mi planeta natal, pero resulta que... les estaba guiando... ¿a ellos?». {n}Señala a los xenos muertos con mano temblorosa.{/n} «Alucinaciones... un espejismo hereje...».

languages.text: {n}Il éternue et la partie inférieure de son visage est à nouveau recouverte de la substance gluante qui s'écoule de son nez. Il vous lance un regard implorant.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que c'est que ce cauchemar ? Je pensais conduire les gardes de l'Empereur au nid des démons, dans les marécages de mon monde... mais vous me dites qu'au lieu de ça, je montrais le chemin à ces... créatures ? » {n}D'une main tremblante, il fait un signe en direction des cadavres des xénos.{/n} « Des hallucinations... Un mirage hérétique... »
languages.original_text: {n}The man sneezes, and the lower half of his face is coated anew in the slime streaming from his nose. The officer casts you a pleading look.{/n} "What is this nightmarish scene? I was leading the Emperor's Guards to the swamp devils' nest across the marshlands of my homeworld... but instead of that I was showing the way to... them?" {n}He points at the corpses of the xenos with a trembling hand.{/n} "Hallucinations... A heretical mirage..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il éternue et la partie inférieure de son visage est à nouveau recouverte de la substance gluante qui s'écoule de son nez. Il vous lance un regard implorant.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que c'est que ce cauchemar ? Je pensais conduire les gardes de l'Empereur au nid des démons, dans les marécages de mon monde... mais vous me dites qu'au lieu de ça, je montrais le chemin à ces... créatures ? » {n}D'une main tremblante, il fait un signe en direction des cadavres des xénos.{/n} « Des hallucinations... Un mirage hérétique... »

languages.text: {n}Der Mann niest, und seine untere Gesichtshälfte wird erneut von dem Schleim bedeckt, der aus seiner Nase läuft. Der Offizier wirft dir einen flehenden Blick zu.{/n} "Was ist das für ein Albtraum? Ich führte die Wachen des Imperators über das Sumpfland meiner Heimatwelt zu dem Nest der Sumpfteufel ... aber stattdessen zeigte ich ihnen den Weg zu ihnen?" {n}Er deutet mit zitternder Hand auf die Leichen der Xenos.{/n} "Halluzinationen ... Ein ketzerisches Trugbild ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The man sneezes, and the lower half of his face is coated anew in the slime streaming from his nose. The officer casts you a pleading look.{/n} "What is this nightmarish scene? I was leading the Emperor's Guards to the swamp devils' nest across the marshlands of my homeworld... but instead of that I was showing the way to... them?" {n}He points at the corpses of the xenos with a trembling hand.{/n} "Hallucinations... A heretical mirage..."

Ich führte die Wachen des Imperators über das Sumpfland meiner Heimatwelt zu dem Nest der Sumpfteufel ... aber stattdessen zeigte ich ihnen den Weg zu ihnen?" {n}Er deutet mit zitternder Hand auf die Leichen der Xenos.{/n} "Halluzinationen ... Ein ketzerisches Trugbild ..."

languages.text: {n}Adam hapşırıyor ve yüzünün alt tarafı, burnundan akan balçıkla yeniden kaplanıyor. Subay sana yalvarır gibi bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bu kâbuslardan fırlama yer de neyin nesi? Yurdumun topraklarındaydım, İmparator'un muhafızlarını bataklık şeytanlarının yuvasına götürüyordum ama aslında... Onlara yolu mu gösteriyormuşum?" {n}Titreyen eliyle zeno cesetlerini işaret ediyor.{/n} "Halüsinasyonlar. Kâfirlik kaynaklı seraplar."
languages.original_text: {n}The man sneezes, and the lower half of his face is coated anew in the slime streaming from his nose. The officer casts you a pleading look.{/n} "What is this nightmarish scene? I was leading the Emperor's Guards to the swamp devils' nest across the marshlands of my homeworld... but instead of that I was showing the way to... them?" {n}He points at the corpses of the xenos with a trembling hand.{/n} "Hallucinations... A heretical mirage..."

Onlara yolu mu gösteriyormuşum?" {n}Titreyen eliyle zeno cesetlerini işaret ediyor.{/n} "Halüsinasyonlar. Kâfirlik kaynaklı seraplar."
